name: Sneak'n'Run
description:
Here is a mini-game I made, it is a stealth game where, as the title suggest, you have to sneak and run.

I have used the Godot Engine for the game development and code, and Fmod Studio for the audio design.

You can find instructions to build the Fmod plugin for Godot at:

https://github.com/utopia-rise/fmod-gdnative/

Unfortunately, for now I can only provide a Windows version of the game.

Please note that the music in this game is an original composition I wrote, and that it can not be used or distributed without my consent.

You can have a look at my resume here:

https://yoannclaude.itch.io/interactiveresume

Enjoy playing!
